sentence: The hotel was RIGHT on the beach
As so many people have stated the hotel is located right on the beach and their 2nd floor balcony rooms are awesome especially to gather your family
Ackem is the best at beach and pool even tracked me down when I left something at the pool
Amazing location the beach was gorgeous
We stayed in an ocean front suite
It is a great spot on the ocean with a nice veranda view just off the lobby
Love the beach and pool and lazy river we have come to your property for the last 4 years for Mothers day we booked a week ahead of Mothers Day because you are so busy
Siting on our balcony overlooking the pool area and ocean this is one of the few absolute beachfront hotels
We are so close to the water you can not even see sand when you sit on the balcony just the beautiful ocean
Great service Javier José Alejandro Steve and others were amazing beautiful ocean view room restaurant
You can not get a better on beach location
Las Olas the restaurant on the intercoastal waterway close to the Pelican for either a great breakfast in the morning or an amazing dinner or lunch
After spending hours in the beach I only saw one waitress walk by once or twice
The beach is right in front of the hotel
No outaide bar at the pool not enough beach assistance servers
And if sticking your toes in the ocean is not your thing well they have a pool with a lazy river that may just your speed
The room was charming but tired kind of like a beach house that ’s been in the family a long time that no one wants to pour money into for a much need update
Book this hotel for a perfect escapade if you want a real vacation which means do nothing but eat walk swim sleep repeat It is feet away from the beach
One day he even pulled double duty at the beach and pool
For instance we got to the beach at 11 and were told all chairs remaining were broke
Now with the closing of the beach and the over capacity at the pool you would think the hotel would cut the rate to exclude some of the amenities you really do n’t have access too or can enjoy
